title: Tom Hardy fans 'swooning' over Mother's Day Bedtime Story teaser
text:
Tom Hardy fans ‘swooning’ over Mother’s Day Bedtime Story teaser 
The actor got parents hot under the collar ahead of his third Bedtime Story Thursday 23 March 2017 18:56 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Teaser: Tom Hardy will read a story on Mother's Day Cbeebies 
Tom Hardy fans were left “swooning” after they were treated to a teaser clip ahead of his next Cbeebies Bedtime Story. 
The 39-year-old actor will read Ross Collins’ There’s A Bear On My Chair on Mother’s Day – much to the delight of parents. 
Speaking to the camera, Hardy says: “Well, I think that there’s enough room for our mouse and bear to sit together here because it’s good for a mouse and a bear to share 
“I’ll see you soon for a goodnight story. Until then, night night.” 
The teaser was posted on the official Facebook account for the children’s channel alongside the caption: “Just leaving this here. Tom Hardy. New CBeebies Bedtime Story. Sunday.” 
One user posted: “That grin that he does at the end every time is him literally saying I know what you women are thinking right now.” Tom Hardy on CBeebies 
Another wrote: “Cbeebies I will miss you when my kids are older.” 
A third posted: “This is so unashamedly not aimed at the children...swoon...we owe you big time. Thank you CBeebies for looking after us mums xx.” Read more
